description:
Pack like an ultralighter, cook like a gourmet. This compact set contains kitchen essentials for eating well and washing up.

  • Set includes a folding Alpine Spoon with measuring lines and a Folding Alpine Spatula with a serrated edge to cut soft foods
  • Ultralight cutting board
  • Salt and pepper shaker
  • Squeeze bottle for soap
  • Dish towel
name: MSR Ultralight Kitchen Set
